description: Add more outdoors to your everyday life with these practical and comfortable Vardag Lite Trousers. Made in durable, weather-resistant G-1000 Lite Eco Stretch fabric with two-way mechanical stretch. The design is simple with tapered legs and five pockets – including characteristic patch hand pockets. Perfect for many types of easy outdoor life, from walks in the forest to biking to work or school.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Lite Trousers - Mens
